item.description:
The Second Jamaica Plain Story Slam of the season at Doyle's @ 3484 Washington Street, Jamaica Plain, MA @ 7:00pm

 

The theme is "Supernatural"

 

Tickets are $8 in advance and $10 a the door.

The theme is "Supernatural" - from ghosts to you bought it all at Whole Foods.
SUPERnatural : of or relating to an order of existence beyond the visible observable universe; especially : of or relating to God or a god, demigod, spirit, or devil
2 a : departing from what is usual or normal especially so as to appear to transcend the laws of nature

Our special guest will make a surprise appearance.....ooooohhhh....

After a SRO 2011 season at Bella Luna's, massmouth‘s Jamaica Plain series continues this year with Robin Maxfield hosting 6 slams at Doyle's. This legendary is a short walk from Green Street Orange Line T stop and there is plenty of parking in 2 lots.

Seating starts at 6:30pm. Stories begin at 7pm. Ten lucky tellers will be drawn at random to tell and be judged. Other audience members can join in on judging teams or just listen and enjoy a night of stories.
Like poetry slams, there is team of volunteer judges and massmouth awards the top stories. Listeners will be engaged in story improv games between each 5 minute feature. Listen to our podcasts at iTunes and podcast webpage:  http://massmouth.libsyn.com  And check out our
video archive to get an idea about 5 minute stories
http://massmouth.ning.com/video  On April 11, 2012 all the finalists will gather at Coolidge Corner Theater main theater to compete for a week in a medieval townhouse in Tuscany and other prizes.

"Because you have a life, you have a story. Bring it!"

Slam rules, tips on storytelling and more information:
http://massmouth.ning.com/forum/topics/story-slam-rules-pr-what-is
Call in a story to try for a sure spot in the line-up:
http://massmouth.ning.com/forum/topics/way-to-be-sure-to-tell-at-a
Free Story Coaching by phone:
http://massmouth.ning.com/forum/topics/free-story-coaching-by-phone


Sundays at 7PM:  Doyles in Jamaica Plain, MA
TICKETS  for JP slams and other JP events at EVENTBRITE:
http://massmouthjp.eventbrite.com/
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the large room in the back of the restaurant. You can't miss us!!

group.name: CLOSING DOWN THIS MEETUP GROUP: massmouth storytellers

item.name: massmouth story slam - "Supernatural"
